definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
to finish work/to complete a project
faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired

sentences.english: I finished watching the movie The Proposal this evening.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上，我看完了電影《假結婚》。

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算鏟完整條路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: You are my life away a never-ending road.
sentences.chinese: 你是我一生走不完的路。

sentences.english: The dog soon ate up the nice cke.
sentences.chinese: 大狗很快就喫完了那塊美味的蛋糕。

sentences.english: When I finished counting the men I had left.
sentences.chinese: 待我清點完人數我就得出發。

sentences.english: Are you through with this word-processor?
sentences.chinese: 這臺文字處理機你用完了嗎？

sentences.english: She saw the light burning and ran the rest of the way to her house.
sentences.chinese: 她看到點亮的燈光，跑完了剩下的路到了家。

sentences.english: Tina:However, the sky quickly clears up after the rain.
sentences.chinese: 不過雨下完之後，天空很快就會放晴了。

sentences.english: After seeing the film the heroine in it swept Peter off his feet.
sentences.chinese: 看完電影之後，電影中的女主角讓彼得心馳神往。

sentences.english: The bird pecked finish, gently comb with rice sleek feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒啄完稻穀，輕輕梳理着光潤的羽毛。

sentences.english: Not quite , I've read all but the last chapter.
sentences.chinese: 沒全看完，只剩下最後一章了。

sentences.english: As she drove home, Mrs. Cox thought about the class she had just left.
sentences.chinese: 科克斯夫人在驅車回家的路上想着她剛上完的這節課。

sentences.english: Do I have to return the car to this location?
sentences.chinese: 車用完後是否得交回到這裏？

sentences.english: Each time a child follows through with a task, he receives a sticker.
sentences.chinese: 每次孩子按照指示做完家務，他都會得到一個貼紙。

sentences.english: Ha ha. I bet they play this and then announce the event is over.
sentences.chinese: 哈，我打包票他們演奏完後宣佈發佈會結束。

sentences.english: One day will not come again.

definition: to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
one time (all the way through)/once through
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
